definitions: moving back or further away from a previous position

examples.text: receding waters exposed the extent of devastation
receding shorelines have destroyed some villages and rising sea levels have submerged uninhabited islands

definitions: (of a man's hair) ceasing to grow at the temples and above the forehead

examples.text: he inherited his father's receding hairline

shortDefinitions: (of man's hair) ceasing to grow at temples and above forehead
